title: Alex Jones Show - 2013 Aug 28 WE [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show
Wednesday, 28 August 2013


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................

From the Infowars web site :: On this Wednesday, August 28 broadcast of The Alex Jones Show, Alex continues to break down the repercussions of war with Syria and how President Obama intends to get away with it despite 91% citizen opposition. 

Alex interviews Climate Depot's Marc Morano about the mainstream media's push on the faux theory of global warming and how the government intends to use it to further tax impoverished Americans. 

Alex will continue to discuss evidence, including intercepted phone calls between Syrian terrorists and Saudi officials, that prove Syrian rebels were behind the chemical gas attack, not the Assad government.

Due to being short of time today, rather than uploading my manual edit of the hourly podcast files, I am uploading the ostensibly "commercial free" Prison Planet members' edit from PrisonPlanet.tv. Back to normal tomorrow.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually essential 
 to seek information from a variety of sources, to listen to a
 spectrum of voices in order to better  understand the "big 
 picture." A reliance solely upon mainstream corporate media 
 for news and info is a prescription for ignorance. I try to
 share information that counters the monotone of mainstream
 corporate media. 

 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents.

 Think for yourself! To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
